<!--

If it is a bug report:

- Search the existing issues.

- Refer to the [known issues](../docs/KNOWNISSUES.md).
- Fill out the following repro template

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->

Steps to reproduce
------------------
On OpenSUSE 13.2
```powershell
	$badPath = " :;!@#$%^&*(){}?+|_-"
	Test-Path -Path $badPath -IsValid 
```
see [Test `Should return false if the syntax of the path is incorrect when using the IsValid switch`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/309bf603f9aff9009dce7e725d42b2d4f99f58c9/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Management/Test-Path.Tests.ps1#L87)

Expected behavior
-----------------
should return` $false`

Actual behavior
---------------
returns `$true`

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value                                           
----                           -----                                           
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha                                     
PSEdition                      Core                                            
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                         
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0                                         
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.17                                 
CLRVersion                                                                     
WSManStackVersion              3.0                                             
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                             
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1     
```

[.Net Core stopped the support for OpenSUSE 13.2](https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/dotnet/2017/02/07/announcing-net-core-tools-updates-in-vs-2017-rc/)
> Fedora 23 and openSUSE 13.2 recently went out of support, per their respective project lifecycle. As a result, we are now no longer supporting or building for Fedora 23 and openSUSE 13.2.
We will be publishing a more formal policy on Linux distro support, in particular on managing end-of-life of distros. There will be opportunity for feedback on the policy before it is finalized.

Thanks @iSazonov

title: Test-Path -IsValid should return $false with an non-rooted path on OpenSUSE 13.2
